numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a correlation between wealth and college admission.
2. If a person is wealthier then the person is more likely to get into a college than a less wealthy peer.
3. I wonder about the cause of this correlation.
4. A wealthier person can donate more money to a college than a less wealthy person.
5. If a person donates more money to a college then the person may be more likely to get into the college.
6. This situation relates to me and my community.
7. This situation can impact a person whom I know.
8. College is an important part of a person's life.
9. If a person cannot get into a college then the future of the person can be affected.
10. The headline is: Finances and college admissions.
